# shared

**Type Property**

The shared cookie storage instance.

## Declaration

```swift
class var shared: HTTPCookieStorage { get }
```

## Getting the shared cookie storage object

- **sharedCookieStorage(forGroupContainerIdentifier:)**: Returns the cookie storage instance for the container associated with the specified app group identifier.

items.description: Returns the cookie storage instance for the container associated with the specified app group identifier.
